Note:
[ [0096ff]TTS MP3 PLAYER[-] ]

Drop a tablet on to the speaker and follow the in chat instructions (host only).

For more information, refer to the Steam Workshop Submission.
LuaScript:
function onload()
  table = getObjectFromGUID("01f71a")
  table.interactable = false
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Assetbundle
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
ncs_infinity = "http://chry.me/NCS_Infinity/01%20-%20Candyland.mp3,\nhttp://chry.me/NCS_Infinity/02%20-%20Safari%20Fruits.mp3,\nhttp://chry.me/NCS_Infinity/03%20-%20Hollah!.mp3,\nhttp://chry.me/NCS_Infinity/04%20-%20Entropy.mp3,\nhttp://chry.me/NCS_Infinity/05%20-%20High.mp3,\nhttp://chry.me/NCS_Infinity/06%20-%20Nekozilla.mp3,\nhttp://chry.me/NCS_Infinity/07%20-%20Adventures%20ft.%20Alexa%20Lusader.mp3,\nhttp://chry.me/NCS_Infinity/08%20-%20Force.mp3,\nhttp://chry.me/NCS_Infinity/09%20-%20Levitate%20ft.%20Joe%20Erickson.mp3,\nhttp://chry.me/NCS_Infinity/10%20-%20Rubik.mp3,\nhttp://chry.me/NCS_Infinity/11%20-%20Steeper.mp3,\nhttp://chry.me/NCS_Infinity/12%20-%20Lovers.mp3,\nhttp://chry.me/NCS_Infinity/13%20-%20Symbolism.mp3,\nhttp://chry.me/NCS_Infinity/14%20-%20Elysium.mp3,\nhttp://chry.me/NCS_Infinity/15%20-%20You.mp3"
ncs_infinity_names = "Candyland,\nSafari Fruits,Hollah!,\nEntropy,\nHigh,\nNekozilla,\nAdventures ft. Alexa Lusader,\nForce,\nLevitate ft. Joe Erickson,\nRubik,\nSteeper,\nLovers,\nSymbolism,\nElysium,\nYou"
function onLoad()
    self.AssetBundle.playLoopingEffect(0)
    string_url = ""
    string_name = ""
    string_tracknum = 0
    string_volume = 0.6
    call_string = ""
    linked = false
    playing = false
    url_input = getObjectFromGUID("47d369")
    name_input = getObjectFromGUID("4851db")
    tablet = 0
    message = "!help"
    local sizeX = 1230
    local sizeY = 1280
    self.createInput({
        input_function="none",
        function_owner=self,
        position={2.89,2.5,-0.13},
        rotation={0, 180, 0},
        scale={0.8,0.1,0.8},
        color={0,0,0,0.4},
        font_color={1,1,1},
        width=sizeX,
        height=sizeY,
        font_size=38
    })
    self.createInput({
        input_function="none",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0.82,2.5,-0.13},
        rotation={0, 180, 0},
        scale={0.8,0.1,0.8},
        color={0,0,0,0.4},
        font_color={1,1,1},
        width=sizeX,
        height=sizeY,
        font_size=38
    })
    -- confirm button
    self.createButton({
      click_function="insert", function_owner=self,
      position={-2.1, 2.5, -0.66},
      height=200, width=1000,
      color={1,1,1,0}, label="",
      tooltip="Apply current playlist and start playback."
    })
    -- play button
    self.createButton({
      click_function="stopPlayback", function_owner=self,
      position={-2.08, 2.5, 0},
      height=250, width=400,
      color={1,1,1,0}, label=""
    })
    -- next button
    self.createButton({
      click_function="nextTrack", function_owner=self,
      position={-2.9, 2.5, 0},
      height=250, width=400,
      color={1,1,1,0}, label=""
    })
    -- previous button
    self.createButton({
      click_function="previousTrack", function_owner=self,
      position={-1.265, 2.5, 0},
      height=250, width=400,
      color={1,1,1,0}, label=""
    })
    -- vol up
    self.createButton({
      click_function="volumeUp", function_owner=self,
      position={-1.5, 2.5, 0.62},
      height=220, width=440,
      color={1,1,1,0}, label=""
    })
    -- vol down
    self.createButton({
      click_function="volumeDown", function_owner=self,
      position={-2.62, 2.5, 0.62},
      height=220, width=440,
      color={1,1,1,0}, label=""
    })

    print("[0096ff]" .. "MP3 Player: " .. "[-]" .. "Drop a tablet on to me to establish a connection.")
end

function onChat(message, player)
  if message == "!help" then
    print("[0096ff]" .. "----------------------------------------" .. "[-]")
    print("[0096ff]" .. "MP3 Player: " .. "[-]" .. "I take links to your MP3 files (must be hosted online) and send them off to a JavaScript player. The URL input is mandatory, the NAME field is not, but strongly recommended as it allows you to display the current track as your provided name. Each entry should be separated by a comma with no spaces, but breaklines (enter) are okay. Each entry in the name field corresponds to it's respective entry in the URL list.")
    print("[0096ff]" .. "----------------------------------------" .. "[-]")
    print("I've provided you with an example playlist Featuring the" .. "[0096ff]" .. " NCS - Infinity " .. "[-]" .. "album. Try hitting the " .. "[0096ff]" .. "[CONFIRM PLAYLIST] " .. "[-]" .. "button or type " .. "[0096ff]" .. "!confirm " .. "[-]" .. "in chat to begin playback.")
    print("[0096ff]" .. "----------------------------------------" .. "[-]")
    print("[AVAILABLE CHAT COMMANDS]")
    print("[0096ff]" .. "\n!help\n!confirm\n!next\n!prev\n!volup\n!voldown" .. "[-]")
    print("[0096ff]" .. "----------------------------------------" .. "[-]")
    print("For more information and configuration instructions, refer to the workshop submission.")
    self.editInput({index=0, value=ncs_infinity})
    self.editInput({index=1, value=ncs_infinity_names})
  end
  if message == "!next" then
    nextTrack()
  elseif message == "!prev" then
    previousTrack()
  elseif message == "!confirm" then
    insert()
  elseif message == "!volup" then
    volumeUp()
  elseif message == "!voldown" then
    volumeDown()
  elseif message == "!stop" then
    stopPlayback()
  end
end


function onCollisionEnter(collision_info)
  local pos = self.getPosition()
  if collision_info.collision_object.tag == "Tablet" then
    tablet = getObjectFromGUID(collision_info.collision_object.getGUID())
    print("[0096ff]" .. "----------------------------------------" .. "[-]")
    print("[0096ff]" .. "MP3 Player: " .. "[-]" ..'Tablet "' .. collision_info.collision_object.getGUID() .. '" found and linked successfully. You can now remove the tablet (but do not delete it.)')
    print("[0096ff]" .. "----------------------------------------" .. "[-]")
    self.AssetBundle.playLoopingEffect(1)
    tablet.highlightOn({0,0.8,1})
    tablet.setValue("http://www.chry.me/tts/musicplayer/standalone_tts.php")
    print("[0096ff]" .. "MP3 Player: " .. "[-]" .. "Input your URLs and *Readable Names (*optional) in to their respective fields and press " .. "[0096ff]" .. "[CONFIRM PLAYLIST] " .. "[-]" .. "to begin playback. Prefer the buttons on me (not on the tablet) for playback controls to be applied for all connected clients.")
    print("[0096ff]" .. "----------------------------------------" .. "[-]")
    print("Try writing " .. "[0096ff]" .. "!help " .. "[-]" .. "in the chat if you're stuck.")
  else
    --print("not tablet")
  end
end

function volumeUp()
  if string_volume <= 0.8 then
    string_volume = string_volume + 0.2
  else
  end
  print("VOLUME: " .. string_volume)
  combineStrings()
end

function volumeDown()
  if string_volume >= 0.3 then
    string_volume = string_volume - 0.2
  else
  end
  print("VOLUME: " .. string_volume)
  combineStrings()
end

function nextTrack()
  string_tracknum = string_tracknum + 1
  --print(string_tracknum)
  combineStrings()
end

function previousTrack()
  if string_tracknum >= 0 then
    string_tracknum = string_tracknum - 1
  else
  end
  --print(string_tracknum)
  combineStrings()
end

function stopPlayback()
  if playing == true then
    tablet.setValue("http://www.chry.me/tts/musicplayer/standalone_tts.php")
    playing = false
  elseif playing == false then
    combineStrings()
  end
end

function none()
end

function insert()
  local url_inp = self.getInputs()
  local url_val = url_inp[1].value
  string_url = url_val

  local name_inp = self.getInputs()
  local name_val = name_inp[2].value
  string_name = name_val
  combineStrings()
end



function combineStrings()
  playing = true
  call_string = 'http://www.chry.me/tts/musicplayer/standalone_tts.php?url="' .. string_url .. ';' .. string_name .. ';' .. string_tracknum .. ';' .. string_volume .. '"'
  --print(call_string)
  tablet.setValue(call_string)
end
